=======
CHANGES
=======

2.0.0 (2025-06-04)
------------------

- switch from z3c.jsonrpc to p01.jsonrpc


1.0.0 (2018-10-4)
------------------

- feature: implemented custom traverser not hidding errors in views as
  LookupErrors.

- feature: new layout mixin helper class offering html and body element id and
  css class mixins in page and forms.


0.5.0 (2012-11-18)
------------------

- initial release
